name: Production ML Solutions & Governance Framework
summary: Client-facing AI delivery portfolio implementing production ML pipelines, governance standards, and operational dashboards for healthcare and FMCG clients.
impact: Standardized experiment tracking and model deployment patterns across multiple engagements.
Operationalized end-to-end pipelines that improved reproducibility and auditability.
Mentored teams on scalable MLOps practices, reducing onboarding friction and improving quality.
